about_the_game:
"Wings of Seduction Art Book" A Collection that captures the intricate designs within the game.

This art book offers readers an exclusive opportunity to delve into the details of the team members. Through detailed illustrations, design drafts, and settings, readers can gain a more comprehensive understanding of the world of Wings of Seduction.

After downloading, the art book can be found in the 'ArtBook' folder within the game directory.

content_descriptors.notes:
All character depicted are over the age of 20.
This game adult content including full nudity, sexual scenes and hypnosis.

short_description: This art book offers readers an exclusive opportunity to delve into the creative background of the story, character development, and world building.
